## Description {#details}

A helper class for combining addressing modes.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/codegenprepare-cpp/#l04395">4395</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/codegenprepare-cpp">CodeGenPrepare.cpp</a>.

### findCommon() {#a892ca606369f593fecbb6a459d55feef}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Value &#42; anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;CodeGenPrepare.cpp&#125;::AddressingModeCombiner::findCommon (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">FoldAddrToValueMapping</a> &amp; Map)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
We have mapping between value A and other value B where B was a field in addressing mode represented by A.

Also we have an original value C representing an address we start with. Traversing from C through phi and selects we ended up with A&#39;s in a map. This utility function tries to find a value V which is a field in addressing mode C and traversing through phi nodes and selects we will end up in corresponded values B in a map. The utility will create a new Phi/Selects if needed.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/codegenprepare-cpp/#l04254">4254</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/codegenprepare-cpp">CodeGenPrepare.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### initializeMap() {#a7f19775e63e43977f53d7e586d82bc2b}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;CodeGenPrepare.cpp&#125;::AddressingModeCombiner::initializeMap (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">FoldAddrToValueMapping</a> &amp; Map)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Initialize Map with anchor values.

For address seen we set the value of different field saw in this address. At the same time we find a common type for different field we will use to create new Phi/Select nodes. Keep it in CommonType field. Return false if there is no common type found.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/codegenprepare-cpp/#l04208">4208</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/codegenprepare-cpp">CodeGenPrepare.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### InsertPlaceholders() {#a712660a2483aec5a62591f70ae98b7e8}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;CodeGenPrepare.cpp&#125;::AddressingModeCombiner::InsertPlaceholders (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">FoldAddrToValueMapping</a> &amp; Map, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; &gt; &amp; TraverseOrder, <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-codegenprepare-cpp-/simplificationtracker">SimplificationTracker</a> &amp; ST)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Starting from original value recursively iterates over def-use chain up to known ending values represented in a map.

For each traversed phi/select inserts a placeholder Phi or Select. Reports all new created Phi/Select nodes by adding them to set. Also reports and order in what values have been traversed.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/codegenprepare-cpp/#l04431">4431</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/codegenprepare-cpp">CodeGenPrepare.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### MatchPhiNode() {#aac861197af1708f2e86f42c3b993344d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;CodeGenPrepare.cpp&#125;::AddressingModeCombiner::MatchPhiNode (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode">PHINode</a> &#42; PHI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode">PHINode</a> &#42; Candidate, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallsetvector">SmallSetVector</a>&lt; PHIPair, 8 &gt; &amp; Matcher, <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-codegenprepare-cpp-/phinodeset">PhiNodeSet</a> &amp; PhiNodesToMatch)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Try to match PHI node to Candidate.

Matcher tracks the matched Phi nodes.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/codegenprepare-cpp/#l04294">4294</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/codegenprepare-cpp">CodeGenPrepare.cpp</a>.

### MatchPhiSet() {#ae695cf315e4383c36383d0b46650ceac}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;CodeGenPrepare.cpp&#125;::AddressingModeCombiner::MatchPhiSet (<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-codegenprepare-cpp-/simplificationtracker">SimplificationTracker</a> &amp; ST, bool AllowNewPhiNodes, unsigned &amp; PhiNotMatchedCount)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
For the given set of PHI nodes (in the <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-codegenprepare-cpp-/simplificationtracker">SimplificationTracker</a>) try to find their equivalents.

Returns false if this matching fails and creation of new Phi is disabled.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/codegenprepare-cpp/#l04347">4347</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/codegenprepare-cpp">CodeGenPrepare.cpp</a>.

### CommonValue {#affc9fddac9f3760872a8a2a6d566912e}

<MemberDefinition
